title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2 & other LLMs in a single Go binary with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker ready).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) wrapper around Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-node
summary: Unofficial Node.js client for Ollama with TypeScript support (npm: ollama-node).

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel wrapper providing a fluent API to query Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models via admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-chat-nextjs
summary: Next.js starter template for building chat UIs with Ollama backend.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside notes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on simplicity and minimal deps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that ingests documents into ChromaDB and answers via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands.
